search_term: Find the official pricing page URL for LearnUpon (learnupon.com). Only provide the exact URL to the pricing page, not a summary of pricing information.
response_text: The official pricing page for LearnUpon can be found at: [https://www.learnupon.com/pricing/](https://www.learnupon.com/pricing/)【3:0†source】.

Reach your goals,  
powered by learning.
========================================

 [See plan comparison](https://www.learnupon.com/pricing/#plan-features)

Essential
---------

  

You’re ready to get serious about learning. It’s time to streamline how you deliver learning to your people with one centralized solution.

Usually up to 150 users.

 [Book a Demo](https://www.learnupon.com/schedule-live-demo/)   

*   SCORM and xAPI Support
    
*   Custom Branding
    
*   Live Learning
    
*   Gamification
    
*   eCommerce
    
*   Webinar Integrations
    
*   Single Sign-On (SSO)
    

Premium
-------

You’re ready to connect your learning strategy into other business tools. It’s time to take learning to your people with deep integrations.

Usually 150 to 500 users.

[Book a Demo](https://www.learnupon.com/schedule-live-demo/)

*   Includes all Essential features
    
*   Multiple Languages
    
*   Zapier Integration
    
*   Two-way API Access
    

Enterprise
----------

You’re ready to deliver learning at scale across your organization. It’s time for an enterprise solution with expert, strategic support.

Usually 500+ users.

[Book a Demo](https://www.learnupon.com/schedule-live-demo/)

*   Includes all Premium features
    
*   White Labelling
    
*   Salesforce Integration
    
*   Enterprise SLA
    

                    

### All plans come with:

  

Customer Success working with you to optimize learning and hit long-term goals.

Strategic advice and tangible action plans informed by our best practices.

An Implementation Consultant to help configure, integrate, and launch.

Technical Support from real people ready to go, 24/7, 365 days a year.

#### LearnUpon's Pricing FAQs

#### What kinds of companies use LearnUpon?

LearnUpon works with organizations of all sizes who want to make learning a central part of their growth strategy and supports over 1,500 organizations worldwide including [Zendesk](https://www.learnupon.com/resources/webinars/create-engaged-learning-culture-in-a-remote-workplace/), Logitech, Twilio, and [Gusto](https://www.learnupon.com/customers/gusto/).

We work with:

*   Large organizations who want to deliver learning at scale across their [extended enterprise](https://www.learnupon.com/solutions/extended-enterprise/) of employees, partners and customers.
*   Medium-sized businesses who need a powerful learning solution that connects learning strategy into other business tools.
*   Start-ups and growing companies who want to centralize learning with their first LMS.

#### What kinds of companies is LearnUpon not a fit for?

LearnUpon will not be a fit for companies looking for a solution for less than 50 users, an on-premise solution, or those requiring HIPAA compliance to process health and/or sensitive personal data within LearnUpon’s LMS. K-12 and higher education organizations training student audiences are also not ideal for LearnUpon.

#### What are some of the ways companies use LearnUpon?

Companies use LearnUpon as a centralized solution to train and enable employees, partners, customers, members, and more.

Here’s a few ways [our customers](https://www.learnupon.com/customers/) use LearnUpon:

*   Employee Training and Development
*   Customer Education
*   Partner Enablement
*   Volunteer Training
*   Selling Training
*   Member Training

#### What industries use LearnUpon?

LearnUpon is trusted by some of the world’s most innovative companies across a diverse mix of industries worldwide, including:

*   Software & Technology
*   Retail
*   Business & Financial Services
*   Nonprofit
*   Construction & Manufacturing
*   Training Companies
*   Associations

#### How do I know which LearnUpon plan is right for my company?

As the first step in your [LMS partnership](https://www.learnupon.com/resources/webinars/how-to-find-lms-partner/) with LearnUpon, your LearnUpon Account Executive (AE) will listen to your requirements to ensure your use case is a good fit, and recommend a LearnUpon plan to fit your specific usage, feature, and support requirements.

[Contact us](https://www.learnupon.com/schedule-live-demo/) to request an intro to one of our expert (super friendly!) AEs.

#### We are a non-profit, is there special LearnUpon pricing available?

Yes, we offer special pricing to eligible nonprofit organizations. [Talk to our team](https://www.learnupon.com/schedule-live-demo/) for details.

 [Contact Sales](https://www.learnupon.com/schedule-live-demo/)

Accept All Cookies

![Image 23: Company Logo](https://cdn-ukwest.onetrust.com/logos/b0c62577-ec91-4e37-ad55-f2d61f9d1c32/127f6999-9265-41ca-aa71-73c964932da6/6bec22fe-b2f1-4aa3-9d28-1ceff6200c50/LearnUpon_two_color_primary_lockup-small.png)

Privacy Preference Center
-------------------------

When you visit any website, it may store or retrieve information on your browser, mostly in the form of cookies. This information might be about you, your preferences or your device and is mostly used to make the site work as you expect it to. The information does not usually directly identify you, but it can give you a more personalized web experience. Because we respect your right to privacy, you can choose not to allow some types of cookies. Click on the different category headings to find out more and change our default settings. However, blocking some types of cookies may impact your experience of the site and the services we are able to offer.  
[More information](https://www.learnupon.com/privacy-policy/)

Allow All

### Manage Consent Preferences

#### Functional Cookies

Always Active

These cookies enable the website to provide enhanced functionality and personalisation. They may be set by us or by third party providers whose services we have added to our pages. If you do not allow these cookies then some or all of these services may not function properly.

#### Performance Cookies

Always Active

These cookies allow us to count visits and traffic sources so we can measure and improve the performance of our site. They help us to know which pages are the most and least popular and see how visitors move around the site. All information these cookies collect is aggregated and therefore anonymous. If you do not allow these cookies we will not know when you have visited our site, and will not be able to monitor its performance.

#### Strictly Necessary Cookies

Always Active

These cookies are necessary for the website to function and cannot be switched off in our systems. They are usually only set in response to actions made by you which amount to a request for services, such as setting your privacy preferences, logging in or filling in forms. You can set your browser to block or alert you about these cookies, but some parts of the site will not then work. These cookies do not store any personally identifiable information.

#### Targeting Cookies

Always Active

These cookies may be set through our site by our advertising partners. They may be used by those companies to build a profile of your interests and show you relevant adverts on other sites. They do not store directly personal information, but are based on uniquely identifying your browser and internet device. If you do not allow these cookies, you will experience less targeted advertising.
